channel.title: The sndwch blog
channel.description: All sandwich news. All the time.

item.title: Introducing sndwch — flavor without limits!
item.description: Sandwiches have divided us for too long. It’s time to come together.
item.content:encoded: Sandwiches have divided us for too long. It’s time to come together.

item.title: The Lunch Special Theory
item.description: There are only three categories of food: soup, salads, and sandwiches.
